ComicInfo.Summary:
Babe recounts the story of Omar Knorr, MD the world's worst doctor.
Tourists push the Impaled Wild Man too far and he goes crazy. Sam meets up with the Page Sisters and agrees to baby sit. Raven, after meeting his spirit guide, decides that the diner staff should depart for Fabletown. Jack Frost sets off to battle the Dragon as Jack the Dragon senses the end.

ComicInfo.Title: The Impaled Wild Man! The Third Ingredient in the Most Unabashedly Genius Jack of Fables Story in Human History!
